item.description:
Group ballroom dance lesson - no partner required. We will be dancing swing and salsa again - for those that attended last time we can build on what you already know, but this will not be too hard if you didn't come the first time!

8 people minimum required otherwise we will cancel. Please bring CASH payment and arrive 10-15 minutes early so we can get in a full hour of dancing!

Wear leather soled shoes and for the women- heels if you prefer. If the weather outside is crummy please wear a different pair of shoes and change when you get there.

The Studio is hard to find. The address is Cottage Ave but you cannot see it from Cottage Ave. If you are facing the front door of The Fours, there is an alley to the left. The Studio entrance is in the alley. The sign above the door says "Danceworks".

group.name: The South Shore Fitness Meetup Group

item.name: Ballroom Dancing
